channel.title: bounty on Dwarves Foundation
channel.description: Recent content in bounty on Dwarves Foundation

item.title: AI News - Data Collection
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: TL;DR Objective: Build a comprehensive data collection and analysis system to track AI industry news, research developments, product launches, and market movements, providing timely insights into the rapidly evolving AI landscape.

item.title: Community Sentiment Analysis - Data Integration and AI
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: TL;DR Objective: Develop an AI-powered system that analyzes community interactions across Discord and social media platforms to understand sentiment, needs, and trends within our community, providing actionable insights for community engagement and product development.

item.title: Competitive Market - Data Collection and Analysis
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: TL;DR Objective: Develop a comprehensive data collection and analysis system to track competitors, market movements, and industry trends across the technical landscape, providing actionable insights into market positioning and opportunities.

item.title: Consulting Pitch - Data Integration and AI
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: TL;DR Objective: Develop an intelligent system that aggregates data about potential clients, market conditions, and our capabilities to generate targeted consulting pitch outlines through LLM analysis, providing customized solutions that address specific client challenges.

item.title: Employee Social Proactivity Analysis - Data Integration and AI
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: TL;DR Objective: Develop a two-phase system that first collects and aggregates data from public Discord channels, then uses analytics and LLMs to evaluate employee social engagement patterns, providing insights into community participation and impact.

item.title: Global Tech Radar - Data Collection and Analysis
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: TL;DR Objective: Build a data-driven system to track and analyze the adoption, maturity, and stability of technologies across the global tech ecosystem, creating a dynamic tech radar that provides real-time insights into technology trends.

item.title: Internal Tech Radar - Data Analysis and Science
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: TL;DR Objective: Develop an AI-powered system that analyzes internal communications and documentation to automatically maintain and update an internal Tech Radar, providing insights into technology adoption, success patterns, and challenges within the organization.

item.title: Sourcing App Ideas - Data Collection and Insights
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: TL;DR Objective: Develop a comprehensive data collection and analysis system to identify viable app ideas by aggregating and analyzing user pain points and feature requests from multiple platforms.

item.title: Sourcing Hiring Demand - Data Collection
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: TL;DR Objective: Build a data collection and analysis system to identify hiring trends and demands across multiple job platforms, providing insights into market needs and skill requirements.

item.title: Tech Events - Data Collection
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: TL;DR Objective: Develop a comprehensive system to collect, aggregate, and analyze tech event data from multiple sources, providing insights into industry trends, popular topics, and networking opportunities.

item.title: Tech Funding - Data Collection
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: TL;DR Objective: Build a comprehensive data collection and analysis system to track funding flows across technology domains, providing insights into investment patterns, emerging fields, and market confidence in different technology sectors.

item.title: Project Charter, Handover, and Report Integration Bounty
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: TL;DR Objective: Create an integrated system that combines Notion and Slack data to enhance project reporting through Dify workflows.

item.title: Project JIRA Data Collection Bounty
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: This bounty focuses on developing a privacy-first data collection system for JIRA, ensuring we can gather valuable insights while respecting user privacy and project policies.

item.title: Project Notion Data Collection Bounty
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: This bounty focuses on developing a privacy-conscious data collection system for Notion, ensuring we can gather valuable insights while respecting user privacy and workspace policies.

item.title: Project Slack Data Collection Bounty
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: This bounty focuses on developing a privacy-first data collection system for Slack, ensuring we can gather valuable insights while respecting user privacy and workspace policies.

item.title: Project Telegram Data Collection Bounty
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: This bounty focuses on developing a privacy-first data collection system for Telegram, ensuring we can gather valuable insights while respecting user privacy and channel/group policies using the MTProto protocol.

item.title: Bounty: List news from whitelisted social platforms on Fortress Bot
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: To utilize the Fortress Bot to display a list of news from whitelisted social platforms. By using specific commands, users can effortlessly track what happening over the world, ensuring they are always aware of the latest information from approved sources.

item.title: Bounty: Link sharing one-time checking on the Tono Bot
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: In the Dwarves Foundation Discord Server, we are now applying the share gift mechanism by using Tono Bot. Once a member shares a link in some specific channels such as #til, #ux or #tech, a small amount of ICY will be sent to user Mochi Wallet as an incentive for sharing and learning.

item.title: Bounty: Active topic list Fortress Bot
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: To utilize the Fortress bot to display a list of the most recent discussion topics from the Discord server of Dwarves Foundation.

item.title: Bounty: Earn list on the Fortress Bot
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: To utilize the Fortress bot to display a list of the 15 most recent bounties of Dwarves Foundation that are either open or in progress.

item.title: Bounty: Memo PR list Fortress Bot
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: To utilize the Fortress bot to display a list of the 15 most recent pull requests (PRs) from the Dwarves memo.

item.title: Bounty: Push note from Discord to Github PR automatically
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Last week, we announced about the reward system for fleetings notes, we understand that knowledge can come from everywhere: trainings, articles,… As there were thousand links shared in our channel #tech of our community, we want to take advantage of this activity to enrich our knowledge with the minimum effort.

item.title: Ascend Bounty
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Possible app name Progress Ascend It sounds like a fun and engaging way to encourage group participation and goal achievement using blockchain technology.

item.title: Tech Canvas
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: This is where we share our journey in the ever-evolving landscape of technology. Itâs a space where we unveil our latest breakthroughs, discuss our research, and delve into our innovative projects.

item.title: What's New in January 2024
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Before you dive in Dwarves is operated as a 50% company, 50% community. Everything we learn along the way of work, we transform into knowledge and distribute back to our tech community.

item.title: Open Bounties
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: The Dwarves bounty program is the means through which both company peeps and the community can contribute to our daily activities.

item.title: Data processing and visual infographics (through DuckDB-WASM)
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)

item.title: Realtime memory knowledge updates (RAG updates)
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Implement a memory storage system Allow realtime context updates for the LLM Refresh the context and LLM knowledge in realtime Add to cycle fine-tuning

item.title: Self-host AI model on the browser
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)

item.title: $icy utility commands
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: ?icy accounting –> smod command or above + head channel only current fund in contract icy in market offset usd unpaid salary advance

item.title: Rework Fortress Command
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: remove: ?event ?staff ?updates rework UI & function (mostly move to note.d) ?digest ?memos ?earn

item.title: Applying MPC for authentication for web3 Console
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Use Multi-Party Computation for secure authentication in a Web3 console environment: Research and implement MPC protocols suitable for authentication. Integrate MPC into the Console app for secure user authentication

item.title: Demo: Biometrics on the web (through external device connection)
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Implement biometric authentication for web applications via external devices: Research and select appropriate biometric hardware compatible with web applications. Develop a secure method for connecting and communicating with the external device.

item.title: Demo: Magic Links
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Implement a ‘Magic Link’ system for passwordless authentication: Develop an email-based authentication system where users receive a unique, time-sensitive link to log in.

item.title: Demo: QR Code based Login
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Create a QR code-based login system for easy and secure access to web applications: Design the QR code generation and scanning process.

item.title: Implement a rust game through WASM
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Design a simple game concept suitable for implementation in Rust. Develop the game logic and user interface in Rust. Compile and optimize the Rust code for WASM.

item.title: Implementing a game server on Rust
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Develop a robust and efficient game server using Rust. Design the server architecture with a focus on scalability and performance. Implement core server functionalities like player management, real-time communication, and game logic.

item.title: Fortress Mma Score
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Update fortress database Create a new table employee_mma_scores including (but not limited): employee_id mastery_score autonomy_score meaning_score rated_at Create a Discord command ?

item.title: Fortress Shanky Data
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: generate & render something as above with following syntax data: source | amount | target sample: Wages [1500] Budget Other [250] Budget Budget [450] Taxes Budget [420] Housing Budget [400] Food Budget [295] Transportation Budget [25] Savings note: hnh i will provide a db view for data queries

item.title: Trend Command
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Requirements ?trend command The idea is to create a ?trend Discord command that will list the top 15 trending repositories on GitHub.

item.title: Community Bounty
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: As you may know,Â Dwarves Discord networkÂ is where we connect with our friends, alumni, and like-minded people. Bounties are rewards (in ICY - Dwarvesâ token) given out to community members for work that encourages community developers to get more involved in the development outside of their core skills.

item.title: Working On A Project Interview Assessment At Dwarves
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: I had my fair share of interviews. Most of them are “traditional” QnA sessions, and unpaid take-home projects, and coding assessments.
